name: openrasmol

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
RasMol is a molecular graphics program intended for the visualisation of
proteins, nucleic acids and small molecules.

dependencies.name: libxext
dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.

dependencies.name: libxi
dependencies.description: libXi - library for the X Input Extension.

dependencies.name: cbflib
dependencies.description:
CBFLIB is a library of ANSI-C functions providing a simple mechanism for
accessing Crystallographic Binary Files (CBF files) and Image-supporting
CIF (imgCIF) files.

dependencies.name: cqrlib
dependencies.description: CQRlib -- ANSI C API for Quaternion Rotations

dependencies.name: cvector
dependencies.description: CVector -- ANSI C API for Dynamic Arrays

dependencies.name: neartree
dependencies.description:
This is a release of an API for finding nearest neighbors among points
in spaces of arbitrary dimensions.

dependencies.name: xforms
dependencies.description:
This is the Free Software distribution of the XForms Library, a
graphical user interface toolkit for X Window Systems.
